markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Siphoning Touch](/Feats.aspx?ID=3387) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Grand Bazaar](/Sources.aspx?ID=100) pg. 124</row>

**Archetype** [Spell Trickster](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=126)

**Prerequisites**
[Spell Trickster Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=3368); ability to cast [_vampiric touch_](/Spells.aspx?ID=354)

</column>

---

When you cast _vampiric touch_, you can modify its standard effects as follows: Instead of gaining the temporary Hit Points yourself, you can grant the temporary Hit Points to an ally within 30 feet. After 1 minute, the ally loses any of these temporary Hit Points that remain.
name: Siphoning Touch
prerequisite: Spell Trickster Dedication; ability to cast _vampiric touch_
prerequisite_markdown: [Spell Trickster Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=3368); ability to cast [_vampiric touch_](/Spells.aspx?ID=354)

When you cast _vampiric touch_, you can modify its standard effects as follows: Instead of gaining the temporary Hit Points yourself, you can grant the temporary Hit Points to an ally within 30 feet.
</summary>
